page.title: 16A MIDDLE CLASS AREA?
page.content: Prior Heath Survey. (Nb.In contrast to the Old Dean First Schools a vast majority of Prior Heath's children are brought to school by car). 1.23 children live in detached houses. 4 live in semi-detached houses. 2 live in bungalows. 1 lives in a flat. 2.Daddy's occupation."I did a bar chart today it was about Daddys Occupation My dad is a Manager of a video shop and works in an office.2 dads are managers 1 dad does adverts 1 dad is an engineer 15 dads work in an office 3 dads are salesmen 1 dad is a policeman 3 dads are pilots 3 dads work on an aeroplane and 1 dad is self employed. 3.Spare time sports:Cricket 4; Football 11;Judo 2;Short Tennis 8; Swimming 20;Golf 3;Gymnastics 8; Trampolining 10.
